== Requirments ==
 * Player level
The experience of the player is reflected by his position within the squadron. 
   * Section leader
   * Flight leader
   * Squadron leader
 * Squadron management
The player can become the CO of a squadron and can then influence the mission parameters. 
   * Select aircraft and loadouts
   * Assign pilot
   * Modify waypoints
 * Rank system
 * Medals and Decoration system
 * Single-player and cooperative multiplayer support
